title: 全國重度級急救責任醫院急診即時訊息
originalTitle: 全國重度級急救責任醫院急診即時訊息

targets.query: select last(pending_ward) from /ER.+/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(pending_icu) from /ER.+/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(pending_bed) from /ER.+/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(pending_ward) from /ER.+/ where $timeFilter and full_reported = true group by time($interval) order asc
select difference(pending_icu) from /ER.+/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc

panels.title: 加護病床等床變化(加護病房是否持續滿床)

targets.query: select difference(pending_ward) from /ER.+/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc

panels.title: 急診等床變化(病房是否持續滿床)

targets.query: select last(pending_ward) from "ER.[[hospital]]" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(pending_icu) from "ER.[[hospital]]" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(pending_doctor) from "ER.[[hospital]]" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(pending_bed) from "ER.[[hospital]]" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
targets.alias: 等急診推床(等同沒有床躺)

panels.title: 個別醫院查詢 (請點選左上角hospita ID)

panels.content:
*各醫院更新資料速度不同，本站每 20 分鐘抓取一次，請自行向各醫院確認。*

1. 左鍵點選項目標題可調整 dashboard (fullscreen etc)
2. 詳細使用方法, 參見 [Grafana](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OUvJamHeMpw)
3. 專案資訊、問題回報：[hackpad](https://g0v.hackpad.com/vtLwiUfYgcc)
4. 以下為分區

急診即時資訊是以「現狀 (AS IS)」被提供出來，並不附隨著任何明示或默示的保證。在任何的情況下，本站都不會因為任何的要求、損害賠償或其他可歸責事由而來承擔責任。
panels.title: 說明
